name: Polygunner (itch)
description:
Shoot your way through waves of bullets in this Shapes and Beats inspired game!

Polygunner is a simple arcade infinite bullet hell, where you take control of a small triangular jet and blast your way through enemy polygons, and weave around bullets and lasers! 

This game is meant to get very difficult very quickly so if you're not a fan of tough games then you probably shouldn't play this.

Check out my friend HyperSlica! He composed the epic music for this game: https://soundcloud.com/hyperslica
